name: WordPress Easy Guide
author: deTheme

sections.description:
Improve user engagement by displaying in-app guided tours that help users perform tasks in your WordPress dashboard.
Create an user journey in a quick and easy way.

Copyright

sections.installation:
Option 1.

  • Upload the entire wpeg folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Option 2.

  • From your wp-admin —> Plugins —> Add New —> Search “WordPress Easy Guide” —> Click install.
  • After plugin is downloaded, click active plugin

After the plugin active

  • You will find ‘WPEG’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.faq:
Is WP Easy Guide free?

Yes! it always will be free.

Should I purchase a premium addon?

WPEasyGuide’s paid services will add more step selectors.
